item.title: Tips for using Makefiles in your projects
item.description: I have a secret: I adore Makefiles.

item.title: Configuring my Congo themed Hugo blog to use Openring
item.description: I really like Drew DeVault’s Openring, an elegant utility that generates links to blogs that I follow under my posts (scroll to the end of this article, you may find something you like!
